Description: This item includes a very nice modern Stauer moonphase pocket watch. Measures approx 36.3mm wide and 66.5mm tall overall including bow. Self winding watch, winds, sets, and keeps perfect time. Watch is an estate find but I do not think it has ever been carried. Still has original protective plastic over crystal. A very unique and beautiful watch.Thanks and please email questions prior to bidding.Payment: Payment Is Due Within 3 Days. Other forms of payment are available upon request.
